stimulusHtml: Which of the following best describes the value printed by the code segment?

features.html:
In the following code segment,  data  is an  int  array with at least two elements.

 

int answer = 0; 
for (int val : data) 
{ 
   if (data[0] < val) 
   { 
      answer++; 
   }
}
System.out.println(answer);

choicesHtml: The number of negative elements in  data
The number of positive elements in  data
The number of elements in  data  that are greater than the first element in  data
The number of elements in  data  that are less than than the first element in  data
